leaders.bg: Former CEO of BCI Capital Corp and President of Asset Finance at CIT Bank. Extensive experience in large-ticket equipment financing and project finance.
Over 40 years in banking and equipment finance. Former CIO at BciCapital, co-head of Wachovia/Wells Fargo equipment finance platform. Held roles at Capital One and New Province Partners.
Over 30 years in financial services. Former Managing Director of Capital Equipment Finance at CIT Group and Chief Commercial Officer at BciCapital.

news.h: Ansley Park Capital Closes Inaugural $400M+ ABS Securitization
news.d: Landmark transaction valued at over $400M, the largest first-time issuance in the large-ticket equipment finance market.

news.h: Ansley Park Capital Surpasses $200M in Funding in First Quarter
news.d: Funded $200M across industries in its first full quarter, bringing total originations to over $250M since inception.

news.h: Ares Management Launches Ansley Park Capital
news.d: Ares Management launched Ansley Park Capital, a newly-formed lending and specialty finance company with 30+ professionals from the former BCI Capital team.

leaders.bg: Founded LeasePoint in 2016, growing it from a small-ticket broker to a national equipment finance platform. Texas A&M BBA graduate. Former Partner at 4 Point Capital Advisors. Inc. 5000 honoree, NextGen 40 Under 40.

10+ years of operations and leadership experience across banking, heavy industry, and tech. Former global commercial credit operations leader at General Electric. Part of executive leadership team at Spruce.

news.h: LeasePoint Secures $40M Incremental Funding from Altriarch
news.d: Secured $40M incremental funding from Altriarch Asset Management via Westlake Securities to support rapid expansion in equipment financing.

news.h: LeasePoint Hires Director of Sales Joshua Pike
news.d: Added Joshua Pike as director of sales with 15+ years of experience leading teams at Xerox overseeing $250M+ in annual revenue.

leaders.bg: Former founding partner at Shield Re-insurance Ltd. Bachelor of Business Administration from SUNY Albany. Launched Broadway Advance in 2014.

news.h: Broadway Advance Continues MCA Operations with 25+ Partners
news.d: Operating with 25+ funding companies and syndicate partners across MCA, small business loans, factoring, and equipment leasing.

leaders.bg: Former EVP at Far West Capital, grew it from small regional practice to national leader. Co-founded Mirabella Estates (sold to Exclusive Resorts in 11 months). Former CFO of Mall.com, raised $7.5M. Started career at Arthur Andersen consulting Fortune 500 companies.

news.h: nFusion Capital Increases Synovus Credit Facility to $125M
news.d: Expanded credit facility with Synovus Bank to $125M with $20M accordion, nearly doubling portfolio since mid-2024.

news.h: nFusion Capital Passes $100M Portfolio Milestone
news.d: For the fifth consecutive year, doubled its portfolio and surpassed the $100M portfolio mark. Now largest individually owned finance company in North America.

news.h: nFusion Capital Expands with $75M Synovus Credit Facility
news.d: Closed a $75M line of credit agented by Synovus Bank to expand lending capacity and added key hires including ABL veteran Daniel Karas.

leaders.bg: CEO of Select Funding since 2014. Based in Burbank, California. Select Funding was founded by leasing industry veterans focused on customer-centric equipment financing.

news.h: Select Funding Continues Equipment Financing Growth
news.d: Continues to provide up to $1M in business and equipment financing within 24 hours, focusing on vendor programs and end-user transactions.

leaders.bg: Principal at Amerifi Capital, a direct funder based in Aventura, FL, providing working capital solutions from $25K-$7M.

news.h: Amerifi Capital Hiring for MCA CEO Role
news.d: Actively expanding leadership team with a search for MCA CEO position in Miami, signaling growth ambitions.

leaders.bg: 12+ years as licensed general contractor. Co-founded and exited cybersecurity company NoPassword. Passionate about construction fintech.

MIT undergrad (Math/CS), Wharton MBA. Held senior roles at Wells Fargo, JP Morgan, Goldman Sachs, Visa. Helped found LendingClub and led its investor side. Head of lending at Uplift. Named Top 100 MIT Alumni.

news.h: BlueTape Launches Lines of Credit Program for Contractors
news.d: Launched a new Lines of Credit program to enhance financing options for contractors, remodelers, and builders in the construction industry.

news.h: BlueTape CSM Named Top Ten Women in Construction
news.d: Customer Success Manager Alyssa Grandison recognized as one of the Top Ten Women in Construction by SunRay Construction Solutions.

leaders.bg: Founded GFE nearly a decade ago. Built GFE into a major MCA player with $100M+ senior debt facility. Featured in deBanked.
Former Executive Director at JPMorgan Chase overseeing cybersecurity, technology controls, and compliance. 20 years in traditional banking. 30-year friendship with co-founder Musheyev.

news.h: GFE Closes $100M Senior Debt Facility
news.d: Successfully closed a senior debt facility of up to $100 million to support continued growth in MCA and reverse consolidation products.

leaders.bg: Co-founded Katapult (NASDAQ: KPLT), a payments company. Cornell Johnson MBA. Previously ran a retail coffee shop in Seattle and residential mortgage brokerage. Met co-founder Luis Scull at ERA accelerator.
Founded Payfully (cash advances for Airbnb hosts). First employee at Open Field Capital, helped grow AUM to $300M over a decade. Previously co-founded Payfully in 2016.
hooks: Grew Open Field Capital to $300M AUM

leaders.bg: 20-year product leader at Microsoft, most recently Principal Program Manager for Microsoft 365 for SMB & M365 Lighthouse. Emory University BA in English.

news.h: Tongo Grows Real Estate Agent Customer Base by 179% in 2024
news.d: Achieved 179% YoY growth, solidified relationships with top US brokerages representing 40%+ of agent population, and 100% retention on Financial Benefits Platform.

news.h: Tongo Launches Financial Benefits Platform for Real Estate Brokerages
news.d: Launched a new platform empowering real estate brokerages to provide agents with essential financial wellness tools.

news.h: Tongo Raises $7M Seed Funding
news.d: Raised $7M seed round to accelerate growth in real estate agent financial services market.

leaders.bg: CEO of TVT Capital since its founding in 2008. Pioneer in bridge loans for small and mid-sized businesses, providing funding from $100K to $25M.
Principal at TVT Capital. Also listed as CEO on some profiles. Long-standing figure in the MCA and alternative lending space.

news.h: TVT Capital Involved in MCA-Related Bankruptcy Proceedings
news.d: TVT Capital listed as creditor in bankruptcy proceedings involving MCA funding disputes in Delaware court.

leaders.bg: Co-founded Good Funding in 2020. CEO leading the company's alternative funding operations for small businesses in Orange County, CA.
Co-founded Good Funding. Previously held roles at National Funding, Quick Bridge Funding, and Five Point Capital. Experienced in alternative business financing.

news.h: Good Funding Closes $20M Credit Facility with $30M Accordion
news.d: Closed inaugural institutional financing—a $20M senior revolving credit facility with option to increase to $30M via Brean Capital.

leaders.bg: CEO of Targeted Lending, leading the company through rapid growth including 65%+ YoY portfolio growth and expanded Wells Fargo credit facilities.

news.h: Targeted Lending Expands Wells Fargo Credit Facility to $75M
news.d: Expanded senior credit facility with Wells Fargo Capital Finance to $75M, capitalizing on industry gap in small-ticket equipment loans.

news.h: Targeted Lending Achieves Record-Breaking Month
news.d: Reached highest number of funded loans in company history, with 65% year-over-year portfolio growth.

news.h: Targeted Lending Secures $50M Wells Fargo Credit Facility
news.d: Closed $50M credit facility with Wells Fargo Capital Finance to support small business lending commitment.

leaders.bg: CEO of Advantage Merchant Funding since 2017 through March 2025. Manhattan-based fintech providing custom funding solutions.

news.h: Advantage Merchant Funding Continues Growth in Manhattan Fintech Space
news.d: Operating as one of Manhattan's fastest-growing fintech companies providing comprehensive custom funding solutions.

leaders.bg: Co-founded Aztec Financial in 1997 with the Hanks brothers. Led the company as President/CFO through its growth as a leading equipment finance provider for specialty contractors. Company acquired by Taycor Financial/North Mill in 2021.

news.h: Aztec Financial Acquired by North Mill and Taycor Financial
news.d: North Mill Equipment Finance and Taycor Financial acquired Aztec Financial from Aramsco, splitting portfolio servicing and origination capabilities.

leaders.bg: 30 years in manufacturing of machined parts before transitioning to financial services. Former Loan Officer at GMAC ResCap. Based in Hollister, California.

news.h: Blueline Capital Group Continues Mortgage Operations
news.d: Providing mortgage origination services across California, Oregon, Montana, Idaho, and Colorado, specializing in standard and reverse mortgages.

leaders.bg: Founded Centra Funding in 2006. 29+ years in the leasing industry. Also President of 4 Hour Funding. Member of AACFB Industry Advisory Council 2024-2025. Centra is subsidiary of CV Holdings.

news.h: Centra Acquires LeaseQ, Launches Centra Culinary Finance
news.d: Acquired LeaseQ restaurant and franchise team from TimePayment Corp, launching Centra Culinary Finance brand for restaurant equipment financing.

news.h: John Boettigheimer Joins AACFB Industry Advisory Council
news.d: Named to the newly-formed AACFB Industry Advisory Council for 2024-2025, representing industry leadership.

leaders.bg: Managing Member of Funderial based in Midtown Manhattan. Pace University graduate. Oversees strategic direction and daily operations.
Executive Vice President at Funderial, based in New York. Previously with Imperial Advance.

news.h: Funderial Launches Merchant Services Division
news.d: Unveiled new Merchant Services division with innovative Split Funding option, expanding offerings for SMBs across the US, Canada, and Puerto Rico.

leaders.bg: Co-founded GoKapital with brother Oliver Moreno. Based in Miami. Previous experience at BlackRock, Finacity Corporation, and US Department of Labor. Named National Financial Services CEO of the Year 2023.

news.h: GoKapital Named Top 7 Best Business Loan Brokers for 2024
news.d: Recognized as one of the 7 Best Business Loan Brokers for 2024 by Fit Small Business, validating its industry position.

leaders.bg: Co-founded InterNex Capital in 2015. Former VP and Head of Global Corporate Receivables Programs at ICE. Former CEO of Working Capital Solutions at GE Capital. Led InterNex past $2B in SMB funding.

news.h: InterNex Capital Surpasses $2B in SMB Funding
news.d: Surpassed $2 billion in funding for SMB clients, doubling from $1B milestone achieved through its digital lending platform.

news.h: InterNex Capital Secures $100M Funding Facility from 400 Capital
news.d: Partnered with 400 Capital Management on a $100M funding facility to provide working capital to small and mid-sized businesses.

leaders.bg: Founded Lendinero in 2014 to address the capital access gap for Latino-owned businesses. Grew revenues 400%+ and net revenues 900%+. Featured in Forbes, Entrepreneur, deBanked. Over $10M delivered to small businesses, 80%+ Latino-owned.

news.h: Lendinero Reshaping Fintech Landscape for Latino-Owned Businesses
news.d: Continuing mission as the leading fully bilingual online finance company, with proprietary platform serving 80%+ Latino-owned businesses.

news.h: Lendinero Foundation Offers Grants to Latino-Owned Businesses
news.d: Launched Hispanic Business Foundation offering grants to support Latino entrepreneurs alongside core lending operations.

leaders.bg: CEO of Mr Advance based in NYC. Former roles at Citi Capital LLC and Yellowstone Capital (A Fundry Brand). Company is a direct lender using fintech for alternative business lending.

news.h: NY AG Settles with MCA Creditors Including Mr Advance
news.d: Included in settlement with NY Attorney General involving 25 MCA creditors to vacate 1,100+ judgments and discharge over $500M in debt nationwide.

leaders.bg: Former co-founder of Par Funding (Complete Business Solutions Group). Pled guilty to RICO conspiracy, securities fraud, and related crimes in connection with $500M fraudulent investment scheme. Sentenced to 13.5-15.5 years imprisonment.
Former co-founder of Par Funding and wife of Joseph LaForte. Claimed net worth of nearly $800M at one point. Involved in SEC fraud case involving nearly $500M in misleading investors.

news.h: Par Funding Principals Plead Guilty to RICO Conspiracy
news.d: Joseph LaForte and James LaForte pled guilty to racketeering conspiracy, securities fraud, and related crimes in $500M investment scheme.

news.h: Par Funding Charged in RICO Superseding Indictment
news.d: Second superseding indictment charged Par Funding principals with RICO, securities fraud, extortion, tax crimes, perjury, and obstruction.

news.h: Par Funding Defendants Settle with SEC
news.d: Defendants agreed to settle with SEC over $500M investment fraud involving misleading investors about loan defaults and business practices.

leaders.bg: Founded TMC Community Capital in 2018 and TMC Financing in 1981. TMC Financing is now the largest CDC in the nation for SBA 504 loans. Bay Area business and civic leader. Disbursed $7M+ to ~350 businesses, 82% to entrepreneurs of color.

First full-time CEO of TMC CC. Born in East San Jose. Former VP of community development at USC Credit Union focusing on South Central LA. Former small business banker at Chase creating nonprofit partnerships. Previously at Mobility Capital Finance fintech.

news.h: First Foundation Bank Awards $100K Grant to TMC Community Capital
news.d: Received $100K grant via FHLB San Francisco to expand Racially Just Community-Based Underwriting program for underserved businesses in rural California.

news.h: TMC CC and Change Reaction Pay Off $160K+ in Small Business Loans
news.d: Partnered with The Change Reaction to pay off loans for 26 Southern California entrepreneurs, totaling over $160K in debt relief.

news.h: TMC Community Capital Opens San Jose Office
news.d: Expanded operations with new Downtown San Jose office, advancing mission of financial justice for marginalized communities in California.

leaders.bg: Founded Wall Street Funding in 2010 as one of the nation's fastest-growing small business lenders. Also founded Onyx IQ (fintech platform). In alternative funding/MCA/B2B space since 2006. Also co-founder of Big Think Capital.

news.h: Onyx IQ Continues Fintech Innovation for MCA Industry
news.d: Jay Keller's Onyx IQ platform recognized as a fintech company to watch, providing technology solutions for the alternative funding industry.

news.h: MCA Industry Faces New State Regulations in 2025
news.d: North Dakota and Texas passed new laws regulating merchant cash advances, impacting MCA providers including Zip Capital Group's market segment.

leaders.bg: Founded LiftForward in 2013. Built embedded lending fintech platform operating in 15+ countries. Partnership with Microsoft and MasterCard. Private equity backed software company powering subscription services and Hardware as a Service.

news.h: LiftForward CEO Discusses Embedded Lending on Fintech Podcast
news.d: Jeffrey Rogers appeared on the Fintech One-on-One podcast discussing LiftForward's embedded lending solutions and international expansion.

leaders.bg: CEO and co-founder of Regium Funding, founded in 2020. Baruch College BBA in Marketing. Led company to $500M revenue in 2024 with 150% YoY growth. Based in Fort Lauderdale.

news.h: Regium Funding Surpasses $1B in Cumulative Sales
news.d: Reached $1 billion in cumulative sales milestone, with $500M revenue in 2024 reflecting 150% year-over-year growth.

leaders.bg: Co-founded Enigma Technologies in 2012 and served as CEO. Columbia University graduate. Co-founded Prime Financial Technologies in 2022 as a spin-off from Enigma. Raised $49M initial funding with Capital One Ventures as investor.

news.h: Prime Financial Technologies Raises $49M to Build SMB Lending Platform
news.d: Secured $49M in initial funding from Capital One Ventures to build technology unlocking SMB lending for community banks and fintechs.

leaders.bg: Started career as attorney, transitioned to mortgage banking then financial sales before founding Big Think Capital. Company ranked #19 on Fortune's Best Small Workplaces 2025 and #30 on Fortune's Best Small/Medium Workplaces in Financial Services 2025.

news.h: Big Think Capital Ranked #19 on Fortune Best Small Workplaces 2025
news.d: Ranked #19 on Fortune's Best Small Workplaces list and #30 in Financial Services & Insurance category.

news.h: Big Think Capital Appoints Ami Dviri as CMO
news.d: Appointed Ami Dviri as Chief Marketing Officer to lead all marketing functions, reporting to President David Brown.

name: CLARIFY CAPITAL II LLC d/b/a Clarify Capital

leaders.bg: Co-founded Clarify Capital in 2017 with Bryan Gerson. Leads a boutique lending firm working with 75+ lenders to secure competitive funding for SMBs nationwide.
Co-founded Clarify Capital in 2017. Leads research initiatives including the 2025 SMB Recession Readiness Report surveying 300 entrepreneurs.

news.h: Clarify Capital Publishes 2025 SMB Recession Readiness Report
news.d: Published survey of 300 US entrepreneurs examining small business preparedness for potential recession and capital access concerns.

leaders.bg: Founded Direct Funding Now in 2015. Five-time Inc. 5000 honoree. Also founded Kudo Funding in 2023. Company hit $28.4M in revenue by June 2024.
CRO at Direct Funding Now. Based in Orange, CA. Previously VP Finance at Complete Funding Financial Services and Chief Sales Officer at US Business Funding.
Chief Operating Officer at Direct Funding Now based in Irvine, CA. Oversees daily operations and financial services delivery.

news.h: Direct Funding Now Named 2025 Inc. 5000 Honoree (#4206)
news.d: Earned fifth consecutive Inc. 5000 recognition, ranked #4206, with $28.4M revenue and continued rapid growth.

name: Duke & Co, LLC d/b/a Dynamic Capital

leaders.bg: Co-founded Dynamic Capital in 2016 in Miami. Provides financing to small businesses traditionally lacking credit access. Active thought leader on MCA industry via LinkedIn and launching 'The Steven Edisis Show'.

news.h: Steven Edisis Announces 'The Steven Edisis Show'
news.d: Launching new show focused on 'Uncomfortable Truths and Unapologetic Facts' about the alternative lending industry.

name: NATIONAL BIZ LLC d/b/a National Business Capital

leaders.bg: Founded National Business Capital in 2007, grew it from spare bedroom to one of top workplaces on Long Island without private equity. Secured $2B+ in total funding for businesses. Named CEO in 2020. Hosts 'The Fund Tank' show.

Promoted to COO after 7+ years as VP of Financing. MIT Applied Business Analytics program. 17+ years of operational leadership in business financing. Oversees funding operations, tech infrastructure, and data intelligence.
CFO at National Business Capital. CPA, CGMA with expertise in data-driven strategies and operational excellence for privately held companies.

news.h: National Business Capital Surpasses $2B in Total Funding
news.d: Exceeded $2 billion in total funding secured for businesses through its 75+ lender marketplace platform.

news.h: Joe Camberato Hosts 'The Fund Tank' Show
news.d: CEO Joe Camberato actively hosting The Fund Tank, a show featuring fintech industry discussions and business funding insights.

leaders.bg: Founded Premium Merchant Funding in 2014 in NYC. Currently listed as Funder. Company provides small business loans, credit card processing, cash advances, payroll, and web services. Revenue of $58.6M in 2025.
COO at Premium Merchant Funding. Fordham University JD in Law. 14+ years of customer service experience. Works closely with CEO Sam Lallouz on company culture.

news.h: Premium Merchant Funding Invests in $90.5M Midtown Office Building
news.d: Participated in property transaction for 292 Madison Avenue office building as both investor and tenant, leasing entire 10th floor.

name: RIVERPOINT FINANCIAL GROUP INC. d/b/a Redwood Capital Solutions d/b/a Express Capital Group

leaders.bg: President of Riverpoint Capital since founding. Family-run business with Sruli Anatian (CEO) and Esther Anatian (COO). Based in Hollywood, FL. Provides short-term business loans and bridge financing.

news.h: Riverpoint Capital Continues Bridge Loan Operations
news.d: Operating under multiple d/b/a brands including Redwood Capital Solutions and Express Capital Group, providing short-term financing to businesses.

leaders.bg: Co-Chief Executive Officer at Shore Funding Solutions since founding in 2014. Based in Melville, NY. Company has facilitated over $1 billion in funding. Inc. 5000 honoree 2025 (#4162).
President of Shore Funding Solutions. Family-run business with Philip Teseo, based in Melville, NY.

news.h: Shore Funding Solutions Ranked #4162 on Inc. 5000 List
news.d: Earned Inc. 5000 recognition, ranking #4162, reflecting continued growth in business lending and lines of credit.

news.h: Shore Funding Promotes Mike Hernandez to CTO
news.d: Promoted Mike Hernandez from Director of IT to Chief Technology Officer, signaling investment in technology infrastructure.
